unnormalised: A property dispute in Jayanagar, Bangalore has escalated, with neighbours claiming ownership of land originally designated as common space. The contested area, approximately 500 sq ft, is located behind house number 78, 4th Main Road, Jayanagar 560011.
normalised: A property dispute in Jayanagar, Bangalore has escalated, with neighbors claiming ownership of land originally designated as common space. The contested area, approximately five hundred square feet, is located behind house number seventy eight, fourth Main Road, Jayanagar five six zero zero double one.

unnormalised: The situation came to a head on 10/11/2024 when construction began on the disputed land. Residents of houses 75 to 82 allege that the builder, Mr. Sharma of "Sharma Constructions," provided false documentation claiming ownership under a new Khata number: BBMP/JNR/2024/1234.
normalised: The situation came to a head on tenth november two thousand and twenty four when construction began on the disputed land. Residents of houses seventy five to eighty two allege that the builder, Mister Sharma of "Sharma Constructions," provided false documentation claiming ownership under a new Khata number: B-B-M-P slash J-N-R slash two thousand and twenty four slash one thousand two hundred and thirty four.

unnormalised: "This land was always meant for everyone," says Mrs. Iyer, a long-time resident of house no. 80. "We have filed a complaint at the Jayanagar police station, reference no. 2024/JNR/CMP/456, and are awaiting their intervention." The address listed on Sharma Constructions' website is 22, 2nd cross, Malleswaram West, Bangalore 560003.
normalised: "This land was always meant for everyone," says Missus Iyer, a long-time resident of house number eighty. "We have filed a complaint at the Jayanagar police station, reference number two thousand and twenty four slash J-N-R slash C-M-P slash four hundred and fifty six, and are awaiting their intervention." The address listed on Sharma Constructions' website is twenty two, second cross, Malleswaram West, Bangalore five six zero zero zero three.

unnormalised: The police have confirmed receiving the complaint and stated they are investigating the matter. Until a resolution is reached, construction has been temporarily halted, leaving the future of the property uncertain for residents of Jayanagar.
normalised: The police have confirmed receiving the complaint and stated they are investigating the matter. Until a resolution is reached, construction has been temporarily halted, leaving the future of the property uncertain for residents of Jayanagar.
